CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.boss = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01/monster-1014")
local diff = self.boss.TransformComponent.Position.x+5.5
self.diff = diff if(self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x <= diff) then self.Entity.ChatBalloonComponent.AutoShowEnabled = true self.start_run = true end
if self.start_run == true then self.Entity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true
local pos = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position pos.x = pos.x + self.speed self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position = Vector3(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z)
end
